column2: ggplot(df,aes(x,y))+geom_point(color="blue4",aes(size=0.3))+ xlab("X - BMI")+ylab("Y - Fat Percentage")+geom_smooth(color="red",method='lm',se=FALSE)+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,size=20,face="bold"),axis.title.x = element_text(size=20, face="bold"), axis.title.y = element_text(size=20, face="bold"), legend.position = "none")
